result.title: Is there a way to search old Codeforces blog entries by date?
result.content: I'm aware that they're already searchable using tags. However, some really interesting blog entries are lost in the noise, and it's getting harder over time to gather and organize them. Some people like me might just find it enjoyable to quickly explore the older topics that were submitted during a given time interval, and who knows, one might stumble upon an interesting technique or discussion. I don't think adding such a feature would hurt.
